text: Borderland is a provincial electoral district in the Canadian province of Manitoba. The riding was created by the 2018 provincial redistribution out of parts of Emerson and Morden-Winkler. ==Election results== {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="4" | 2016 provincial election redistributed results |- ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF" width="130px" colspan="2" | Party ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF" width="30px" | % |- | | | Progressive Conservative ||align=right| 79.3 |- | | | Liberal ||align=right| 14.9 |- | | | New Democratic ||align=right| 3.8 |- | | | Green ||align=right| 2.0 |} ==References== Category:Emerson, Manitoba Category:Manitoba provincial electoral districts
title: Borderland (electoral district)
